Class ec.vatimpl.GuestFilter 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.vatimpl.GuestFilter
public class GuestFilter
extends Object
implements ClassFilter
The GuestFilter is responsible for transforming all not-necessarily-trusted code into a form suitable for Vat habitation. The code becomes "trusted by construction"--that is, the GuestFilter performs transformations and verifications on the code which guarantee that it lives by the rules.

transformClass(ClassFile)
